Detailed Description

A file data stream.

This class represents a file stream based in the std::fstream

Definition at line 14 of file FileStream.hh.

Member Function Documentation

void FileStream::open ( std::string  path,
ios_base::openmode  mode = ios_base::in|ios_base::out 
)

Opens a file using the first parameter as a path and gets de default information of this file.

Parameters:
path Path to the file.
mode Mode to open de file. It can be ios_base::in for read, ios_base::out for write.

void FileStream::open ( ios_base::openmode  mode = ios_base::in|ios_base::out  ) 

Opens a file using the constructed path and gets de default information of this file.

Parameters:
mode Mode to open de file. It can be ios_base::in for read, ios_base::out for write.
